title: K-Cluster Hub
fullDescription: K-Cluster Hub is a web app for smart clustering analysis using K-Means, K-Modes, and K-Prototypes, started as my thesis (Web K-Means) and later evolving into a published tool featured in two scientific journals.

title: Skinet
fullDescription: Skinet is a full-stack e-commerce application built as part of a Udemy course, using C# with ASP.NET Core for the backend and Angular for the frontend. The app features product listings, shopping cart functionality, coupon-based discounts, and Stripe integration for payments. It also includes an admin panel for managing products, brands, categories, and processing refunds. The project is deployed on Azure with automated CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions.

title: IEEMDB
fullDescription: IEEMDB is a team project built for a university course by a 5-member team. I led the frontend (3 members) using React, implementing auth, search, watchlists, and favorites with minimal UI and smooth UX.

title: Quarto Board Game
fullDescription: Quarto is a strategic board game where players aim to align four pieces sharing a common attribute, built for a university course, it was voted among the top 5 projects out of 40+ submissions.

title: Pharmacy Finder
fullDescription: Pharmacy Finder is a native mobile app built with Flutter that helps locate pharmacies using Google Maps APIs and autocomplete. It also features functions for on-duty and nearby pharmacies.

title: Pharmacy Finder Scraper
fullDescription: Pharmacy Finder Scrapper is a Node.js tool that scrapes and cleans data to find on-duty pharmacies, providing the results as a JSON API used by the mobile app.

title: Hotel Reservation System
fullDescription: Hotel Reservation System is a reservation manager for hotel reception to handle all hotel operations. Built as a university team project of 3 using SQL procedures and JavaFX.

title: Multithreaded Downloader
fullDescription: Multithreaded Downloader is a Python program that downloads multiple HTML files simultaneously using threads and locks for efficient concurrency.
